hero.subtitle: A collection of thoughtfully designed micro-apps to help you track expenses, investments, workouts, recipes, and more. All your data stays on your device.

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: By default, all your data is stored locally on your device using your browser's storage. This means your data never leaves your device unless you explicitly enable cloud backup.

items.question: Can I use the apps offline?
items.answer: Yes! All our apps work fully offline. Some features like syncing Strava data or fetching current stock prices require internet, but the core functionality works without it.

items.question: What happens if I clear my browser data?
items.answer: If you clear your browser data, your app data will be deleted. We recommend enabling cloud backup or regularly exporting your data to prevent data loss.

items.question: How does Pay What You Want work?
items.answer: We suggest a price based on your region's cost of living, but you're free to pay more or less. If you're a student or facing financial difficulties, feel free to pay less. If you can afford more, your extra contribution helps us keep building.

items.question: Can I switch between free and paid?
items.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to remove ads and unlock premium features anytime. If you cancel your subscription, you'll keep access until the end of your billing period, then return to the free tier.

items.question: What's included in the Founding Member plan?
items.answer: The Founding Member plan (‚Ç¨599 one-time) gives you lifetime access to ALL apps and ALL future versions forever. You also get early access to new features, your name in our Hall of Fame, quarterly Q&A sessions with the founder, priority feature requests, and direct support via Discord. It's limited to the first 100 members.

items.question: Do you have a mobile app?
items.answer: Our web apps are fully responsive and work great on mobile browsers. You can even install them as PWAs (Progressive Web Apps) for an app-like experience.

items.question: How do I contact support?
items.answer: You can reach us at support@breathofnow.site or through the contact form. We typically respond within 24-48 hours.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.subtitle: Your data lives on your device. We can't see it, we can't sell it, we can't lose it. This isn't just a feature‚Äîit's our fundamental principle.
privacyFirst.metaDescription: Your data lives on your device. We can't see it, we can't sell it, we can't lose it.
privacyFirst.howWeProtectSubtitle: Privacy isn't an afterthought‚Äîit's baked into our architecture

localStorage.title: Local-First Storage
localStorage.description: All your data is stored locally in your browser's IndexedDB. No server uploads by default.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: When you enable cloud sync, your data is encrypted before leaving your device.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero Knowledge
zeroKnowledge.description: We literally cannot see your data. Even with cloud sync enabled, we only store encrypted blobs.

noTracking.title: No Third-Party Analytics
noTracking.description: We don't use Google Analytics or any invasive tracking. Your usage stays private.

yourControl.title: Your Device, Your Control
yourControl.description: Export your data anytime in standard formats. Delete everything with one click.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: Built with European privacy standards in mind. Your rights are protected.

privacyFirst.yourDeviceDesc: All data stored locally in IndexedDB

cta.title: Ready to Take Back Your Privacy?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who value their data privacy. Start free today.

worksOffline.title: Works Offline
worksOffline.subtitle: No internet? No problem. All apps work fully offline with optional cloud sync. Your productivity doesn't depend on a connection.
worksOffline.metaDescription: No internet? No problem. All apps work fully offline with optional cloud sync.
worksOffline.alwaysAvailableSubtitle: Built from the ground up to work offline, not as an afterthought

trueOffline.title: True Offline Mode
trueOffline.description: All core features work without any internet connection. Track expenses on a flight, log workouts in the mountains.

instantResponse.title: Instant Response
instantResponse.description: No network latency. Your data is right there on your device, ready in milliseconds.

pwa.title: Progressive Web App
pwa.description: Install on your home screen like a native app. Works seamlessly across all devices.

smartSync.title: Smart Sync
smartSync.description: When you're back online, changes sync automatically. No manual intervention needed.

cloudBackup.title: Optional Cloud Backup
cloudBackup.description: Premium users can enable cloud sync for cross-device access while keeping offline functionality.

everywhere.title: Works Everywhere
everywhere.description: From remote beaches to subway tunnels‚Äîyour apps work wherever you are.

step1.title: Data Stored Locally
step1.description: All your data is stored in IndexedDB, a powerful browser database that persists even when offline.

step2.title: Service Worker Magic
step2.description: Our service worker caches the app so it loads instantly, even without network access.

step3.title: Queue Changes
step3.description: When offline, any changes you make are queued and ready to sync when you reconnect.

step4.title: Automatic Sync
step4.description: Back online? Changes sync automatically in the background. No manual steps required.

traveling.title: Traveling
traveling.desc: Track expenses during flights and in areas without coverage

outdoor.title: Outdoor Activities

commuting.title: Commuting

international.title: International Travel

poorConnectivity.title: Poor Connectivity
poorConnectivity.desc: Works perfectly in areas with spotty internet

cta.title: Never Depend on a Connection Again
cta.subtitle: Start using apps that respect your independence. Work anywhere, anytime.

beautifullySimple.title: Beautifully Simple
beautifullySimple.subtitle: No bloat, no complexity. Each app does one thing and does it exceptionally well. Design that gets out of your way.

beautifullySimple.designPhilosophySubtitle: We believe the best tools are the ones you don't have to think about

cleanInterface.title: Clean Interface

noLearningCurve.title: No Learning Curve

cta.title: Experience Thoughtful Design

noUpselling.description: We won't spam you with upgrade prompts. Premium is there when you want it.

lifetimeOption.title: Lifetime Option
lifetimeOption.description: For those who prefer one-time payments, our Founding Member plan gives lifetime access.

cancelAnytime.title: Cancel Anytime
cancelAnytime.description: No long-term contracts. Cancel your subscription whenever you want, no questions asked.

cta.title: Start at the Right Price for You
cta.subtitle: Get started today with pricing that respects your situation.

openTransparent.title: Open & Transparent
openTransparent.subtitle: We're clear about how our apps work and what they do with your data. No hidden agendas, no fine print surprises.
openTransparent.metaDescription: We're clear about how our apps work and what they do with your data.
openTransparent.commitmentSubtitle: We believe you deserve to know exactly how things work

clearPolicies.title: Clear Policies
clearPolicies.description: Our privacy policy and terms of service are written in plain language, not legal jargon.

dataExplanation.title: Data Explanation
dataExplanation.description: We explain exactly what data we collect (minimal) and why we need it.

noHiddenFees.title: No Hidden Fees
noHiddenFees.description: The price you see is the price you pay. No surprise charges or automatic renewals without notice.

openRoadmap.title: Open Roadmap
openRoadmap.description: Our development roadmap is public. See what we're working on and what's coming next.

honestMarketing.title: Honest Marketing
honestMarketing.description: We don't exaggerate features or use manipulative tactics. What you see is what you get.

responsiveFeedback.title: Responsive to Feedback
responsiveFeedback.description: We actively listen to user feedback and communicate openly about changes and decisions.

promises.noSelling: We will never sell your data
promises.noTracking: We don't track you across the web
promises.noPriceHikes: No surprise price increases for existing users

cta.title: Join a Community Built on Trust
cta.subtitle: Start using apps from a company that respects you.

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.subtitle: No VC funding, no growth hacks. Just sustainable software built to last. We're in this for the long term.
sustainable.metaDescription: No VC funding, no growth hacks. Just sustainable software built to last.
sustainable.approachSubtitle: We're building software that will be here for decades, not quarters

noVc.title: No VC Funding
noVc.description: We're bootstrapped and profitable. We answer to users, not investors demanding growth at any cost.

longTermView.title: Long-term View
longTermView.description: We make decisions for the next decade, not the next quarter. Sustainable growth over explosive scaling.

profitableModel.title: Profitable Business Model
profitableModel.description: We're not burning through investor money hoping to figure out monetization later.

noBaitSwitch.title: No Bait and Switch
noBaitSwitch.description: We won't slash prices to get you in, then raise them once you're hooked. Prices stay fair.

dataPortability.title: Data Portability
dataPortability.description: Export your data anytime. Even if we shut down (we won't), your data is yours.

minimalDependencies.title: Minimal Dependencies
minimalDependencies.description: We don't rely on third-party services that might disappear. Your apps will keep working.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.desc: Apps won't suddenly disappear because funding ran out

stability.title: Stability
stability.desc: No radical pivots to chase the latest trend

trust.title: Trust
trust.desc: We won't sell out to a company that doesn't share our values

continuity.title: Continuity
continuity.desc: The features you love will still be there next year

cta.title: Choose Software Built to Last
cta.subtitle: Join users who value sustainable, ethical software.
